    Perfect!    She will "Appreciate" it. Thanks again!
Thank you so much! Haven't seen this since I was 6 years old. This movie scared me so much back then haha. Great memories!!!

I think this was the oldie that Larry Vincent on "Fright Night" used to slam.... But with the decent reviews that I am reading below, I think there must be another mushroom dud... I'll d/l this to find out.
